author: Irwin Bryan
content:
A great report on a horrible situation.

If they can’t dock how are they being resupplied with food for all these workers?

author: Doug Bostrom
content: Books will be written about this. It’s profoundly wrong.

author: Ginny in America
content: Imagine being cooped up on a Cruise Ship for not just weeks, but months and months? What a horrible thought!
